Class BSTNode<T extends Generic>

java.lang.Object
BSTNode<T>
public class BSTNode<T extends Generic> extends Object
Node for the Binary tree
Since:
25-02-2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Inhle Cele and CSC2001F notes- Binary trees (Prof. Jan Buys)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BSTNode(Generic d)
    Constructor which creates a object of the BSTNode class that has to be of type Generic and has no children/leaf nodes
    BSTNode(Generic d, BSTNode<Generic> l, BSTNode<Generic> r)
    Constructor which creates a object of the BSTNode class that has to be of type Generic but has children/leaf nodes that are known

  • Constructor Details

    • BSTNode

      public BSTNode(Generic d)
      Constructor which creates a object of the BSTNode class that has to be of type Generic and has no children/leaf nodes
      Parameters:
      d - Object which holds the term, statement and confidence score of the specified item

    • BSTNode

      public BSTNode(Generic d, BSTNode<Generic> l, BSTNode<Generic> r)
      Constructor which creates a object of the BSTNode class that has to be of type Generic but has children/leaf nodes that are known
      Parameters:
      d - Object which holds the term, statement and confidence score of the specified item
      l - left child of object specified in d
      r - right child of object specified in d

  • Method Details

    • getData

      public Generic getData()
      Returns the data of the specified node as a Generic Object which holds the term, statement and confidence score
      Returns:
      Generic object of the node with the term, statement and confidence score

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(BSTNode<Generic> compareNode)
      Compares the data in the BSTnode to other BSTNode object alphabetically
      Parameters:
      compareNode - the BTSNode object of type Generic being compared to data
      Returns:
      -1, 0 or 1 as this compareNode is alphabetically less than, equal to, or greater than the BSTNode.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(String compareNode)
      Compares the data in the BSTnode to a string/Term, alphabetically
      Parameters:
      compareNode - the String object being compared to data
      Returns:
      -1, 0 or 1 as this compareNode is alphabetically less than, equal to, or greater than the BSTNode.
